channel.title: Server only?
channel.description: how do i maske my figment source server only so syi's and null's cant get through? i dont want to add an anti syi or anti null i just want my server to be like client only so that when people try to log in from other server like silab or sumthing they go black screen i know it can happen i just need directions on doing please :confused: :eek:
